data.message:
Hello, I am one of the admin of nonprofit organisation Foundation for help to children in Slovenia and on 20th of June you have changed our nonprofit  template. Now, if I go to our page and want to open a discussion ( that is so grate!), there is no way I can do it, because there is only a message; 
Content was blocked because it was not signed by a valid security certificate. The same tekst is on a page Gifts with a meaning, on the page Join us,  Top fans of the page,... What can/ must/ should we do to open all kontekst - what means a valid security certificate and how can we prove that we are real to you to open us all the possibilities? Our Page ID is 117141798420157. Please help!
